content.rendered:
Series content The series takes place in an age where the majority of superheroes are filled with celebrity status, and this is often coupled with irresponsible behavior that also puts the security of the world at risk. The focus is on a renegade team that deals with these corrupt, cannibalized heroes and liquidates them if necessary.”

Number of seasons: 3 (2019- )

Status: Ongoing

Creator: Eric Kripke

Channel: Amazon

Starring: Karl Urban, Jack Quaid, Antony Starr
